mapper.select:
SELECT`sid`,`checkout_title`,`checkout_id`,`checkout_doctor_id`,`checkout_doctor_name`,`sample_code`,`sample_name`,`checkout_date`, `checkout_time`,`checkout_remark`,`checkout_goal`,`yz_id`,`diagnose_result`,`diagnose_text`,`depart_code`,`member_id`,`visit_no`,department_name, record_origin,is_valid,hospital_id,hospital_name FROM t_checkout t where t.member_id = #{memberId} and is_valid=1
and checkout_title != '生命体征记录' and checkout_title != '胰岛素功能测定记录' and checkout_title != '其他检查' and checkout_title != '实验室检查记录' order by checkout_date desc,checkout_time desc

SELECT `sid`,`checkout_title`,`checkout_id`,`checkout_doctor_id`,`checkout_doctor_name`,`sample_code`,`sample_name`, `checkout_date`,`checkout_time`,`checkout_remark`,`checkout_goal`, `yz_id`,`diagnose_result`,`diagnose_text`,`depart_code`, `member_id`,`visit_no`,`report_date`, `department_id`,`department_name`,`diagnose_opinion`,`submit_checkout_date`, record_origin,is_valid,hospital_id,hospital_name FROM t_checkout t where t.checkout_id = #{checkoutId}
and t.hospital_id = #{hospitalId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_checkout (sid, checkout_title, checkout_id, checkout_doctor_id, checkout_doctor_name, sample_code, sample_name, checkout_date, checkout_time, checkout_remark, checkout_goal, yz_id, diagnose_result, diagnose_text, depart_code, member_id, visit_no, report_date, department_id, department_name, submit_checkout_date, diagnose_opinion,record_origin,hospital_id,hospital_name) values (#{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkoutTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkoutId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkoutDoctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkoutDoctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sampleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sampleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkoutDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{checkoutTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkoutRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkoutGoal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yzId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagnoseResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagnoseText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{visitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submitCheckoutDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{diagnoseOpinion,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{recordOrigin},#{hospitalId},#{hospitalName})
mapper.update:
update t_checkout
checkout_title = #{checkoutTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checkout_id = #{checkoutId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checkout_doctor_id = #{checkoutDoctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checkout_doctor_name = #{checkoutDoctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sample_code = #{sampleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sample_name = #{sampleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checkout_date = #{checkoutDate,jdbcType=DATE},
checkout_time = #{checkoutTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checkout_remark = #{checkoutRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checkout_goal = #{checkoutGoal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
yz_id = #{yzId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
diagnose_result = #{diagnoseResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
diagnose_text = #{diagnoseText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
depart_code = #{departCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
visit_no = #{visitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
report_date = #{reportDate,jdbcType=DATE},
department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
department_name = #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
submit_checkout_date = #{submitCheckoutDate,jdbcType=DATE},
diagnose_opinion = #{diagnoseOpinion,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
is_valid = #{isValid},
hospital_id = #{hospitalId},
hospital_name = #{hospitalName},
where checkout_id = #{checkoutId} and sid=#{sid} and record_origin = 2
mapper.select: select sid, checkout_id, checkout_code, checkout_name, checkout_result, result_unit, qualitative_result, reference_range, abnormal_sign, acronym, checkout_result_last,is_valid,hospital_id,hospital_name, checkout_datetime from t_checkout_detail where checkout_id = #{checkoutId} and is_valid=1
mapper.insert: insert into t_checkout_detail (sid, checkout_id, checkout_code, checkout_name, checkout_result, result_unit, qualitative_result, reference_range, abnormal_sign, acronym, checkout_result_last,member_id ,insert_dt,is_valid,hospital_id,hospital_name,checkout_datetime) values (#{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkoutId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkoutCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkoutName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkoutResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualitativeResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{referenceRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abnormalSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acronym,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkoutResultLast,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{memberId} ,now(),1,#{hospitalId},#{hospitalName},#{checkoutDatetime})
mapper.select: SELECT`sid`,`checkout_title`,`checkout_id`,`checkout_doctor_id`,`checkout_doctor_name`,`sample_code`,`sample_name`,`checkout_date`, `checkout_time`,`checkout_remark`,`checkout_goal`,`yz_id`,`diagnose_result`,`diagnose_text`,`depart_code`,`member_id`,`visit_no`,department_name, record_origin,is_valid FROM t_checkout t where t.member_id = #{memberId} and t.is_valid=1 and checkout_date is not null and checkout_time is not null order by report_date desc limit 1

SELECT`sid`,`checkout_title`,`checkout_id`,`checkout_doctor_id`,`checkout_doctor_name`,`sample_code`,`sample_name`,`checkout_date`, `checkout_time`,`checkout_remark`,`checkout_goal`,`yz_id`,`diagnose_result`,`diagnose_text`,`depart_code`,`member_id`,`visit_no`,department_name, record_origin,is_valid FROM t_checkout t where t.member_id = #{memberId} and t.is_valid=1 and t.`checkout_date` > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) GROUP BY t.`checkout_title` ORDER BY t.`checkout_date` DESC,t.`checkout_time` DESC

SELECT`sid`,`checkout_title`,`checkout_id`,`checkout_doctor_id`,`checkout_doctor_name`,`sample_code`,`sample_name`,`checkout_date`, `checkout_time`,`checkout_remark`,`checkout_goal`,`yz_id`,`diagnose_result`,`diagnose_text`,`depart_code`,`member_id`,`visit_no`,department_name, record_origin,is_valid,hospital_id,hospital_name FROM t_checkout t where t.member_id = #{memberId} and t.is_valid=1 and t.`checkout_date` >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH) and (t.hospital_id=#{hospitalId} or t.hospital_id=-1) GROUP BY t.`checkout_title` ORDER BY t.`checkout_date` DESC,t.`checkout_time` DESC
mapper.insert: insert into t_checkout (sid, checkout_title, checkout_id, checkout_doctor_id, checkout_doctor_name, sample_code, sample_name, checkout_date, checkout_time, checkout_remark, checkout_goal, yz_id, diagnose_result, diagnose_text, depart_code, member_id, visit_no, report_date, department_id, department_name, submit_checkout_date, diagnose_opinion,record_origin,hospital_id,hospital_name ,visit_type) values (#{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkoutTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkoutId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkoutDoctorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkoutDoctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sampleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sampleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkoutDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{checkoutTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkoutRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkoutGoal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yzId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagnoseResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagnoseText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{visitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submitCheckoutDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{diagnoseOpinion,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{recordOrigin},#{hospitalId},#{hospitalName} ,#{visitType}) on duplicate key update update_dt = now(),checkout_id = #{checkoutId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
